description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for the registration screen, allowing users to create an account by entering a username and password. It manages form validation, displays errors, and navigates to other screens upon successful registration.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget representing the registration screen in the app.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget, returning an instance of _RegisterScreenState.
